markdownRemark.html: So yesterday ReactConf started with the opening keynote of Sophie Alpert and Dan Abramov about “React Today and Tomorrow”. Dan introduced Hooks, which is currently in React v16.7.0-alpha and in a RFC status. I was really hooked (pun intended) about the new possibilites with the new API and many library developers immediately started to try it out and they were amazed too.
